Literature.Title: A novel, rationally designed, hybrid antimicrobial peptide, inspired by cathelicidin and aurein, exhibits membrane-active mechanisms against Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
Literature.Author: Klubthawee N, Adisakwattana P, Hanpithakpong W, Somsri S, Aunpad R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>250µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>250µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=>250µg/ml),Shigella sonnei ATCC 11060(MIC=>250µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=>250µg/ml),Vibrio cholerae O1 Inaba(MIC=>250µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=>250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>250µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>250µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=>250µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>250µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes 10403s(MIC=>250µg/ml)
